name: Cubtris
description:
it's arcade game of the new generation.

* Realistic 3D graphics and animation
* Simple& handy touch controls
* The game is collect cubes and win
The game play is, you need in precise way to collect objects with square form with the Yellow box collector that fall from above ,only triangles and round object do not pas trough.
if they stuck in the opening then you should shoot them!

The Yellow collector can also collect falling objects from his both sides,but in same time there is risk to collide and explode from touching triangle&round objects(enemies) in the floor.
There are 3 worlds with 25 levels for FREE to play.. enjoy!
